Class BoardFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • de.upb.cs.swtpra_04.qwirkle.view.BoardFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View$OnCreateContextMenuListener, BoardFragmentInterface

    public class BoardFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements BoardFragmentInterface
    Handles UI representation of the game board
